user_question: What if soccer balls were cube-shaped? How would that affect the game?
final_answer: If soccer balls were cube-shaped, the game would be drastically different. The ball would not roll smoothly, making dribbling and passing much more difficult. Players would have to adapt to a new style of play, focusing more on precise kicks and controlling the unpredictable bounces. The game would likely be slower and require new strategies.
